description:
Puts links into groups.

The most important link in a group can be highlighted with a border: set the `theme` property to `primary` for this link.

This only groups links, unlike [view.group](view.group.md).

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/2IwCYi-S3xPSL9)
properties.links.description: Array of links that make up a group.
properties.links.items.properties.conten: Link text displayed to a Toloker.
Link text displayed to a Toloker. Unviewed links are blue and underlined, and clicked links are purple.
Defines the appearance of the link. If you specify `"theme": "primary"`, it's a button, otherwise it's a text link.
properties.links.items.properties.url.de: Link address. Inserts a link with the search query when [helper. search-query](helper.search-query.md) is used.
